function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of proper maintenance of green spaces leading to the spread of contagious diseases","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission to residents and visitors","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance and sanitation of green spaces, proper waste management, and education on hygiene practices","Technologies":"Sanitation systems, waste management solutions, and educational technologies","People":"Residents, visitors, and stakeholders","Owner":"Building management and maintenance teams"},{"Description":"Inadequate sanitation of water features leading to the spread of water-borne diseases","Impact":"Increased risk of water-borne diseases among residents and visitors","Mitigation":"Implementation of proper water sanitation systems, regular monitoring of water quality, and education on water hygiene","Technologies":"Water purification and filtration systems, water quality monitoring devices, and educational technologies","People":"Residents, visitors, and stakeholders","Owner":"Building management and maintenance teams"},{"Description":"Inadequate access to outdoor spaces leading to mental health issues during quarantine","Impact":"Increased risk of depression and mental stress among residents during quarantine","Mitigation":"Provision of adequate outdoor spaces, promotion of outdoor activities, and access to natural elements to support mental well-being","Technologies":"Smart monitoring systems for outdoor spaces, mental health monitoring technologies, and community engagement platforms","People":"Residents, visitors, and stakeholders","Owner":"Building developers and management teams"}]}
